inclusion.criterion: asymptomatic chronic, severe primary degenerative MR known to the Queen Elizabeth Hospital Birmingham
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: history of myocardial infarction, previous coronary artery bypass graft, or valve surgery
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: congenital heart disease; including common atrio-ventricular canal defects
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: more than mild coexisting aortic valve stenosis or regurgitation
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: primary mitral regurgitation not due to degenerative disease, including rheumatic disease and infective endocarditis
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: uncontrolled atrial fibrillation (resting HR>100/min average on 24 hour Holter )
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: unable to walk on treadmill or use supine bicycle
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has severe mitral valve prolapse with regurgitation and remains symptomatic. EF of 65% on TTE.
